channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Today is the last day for many Education Department workers. Here's what they did
item.description: Employees across multiple divisions agree: They can't imagine how the department will fulfill its legal obligations with roughly half its staff gone.

item.title: Stock markets drop as Trump unleashes new round of global tariffs

item.title: Hasan Piker: a "himbo gateway drug" for progressives?
item.description: Hasan Piker likes fitness, gaming, and progressive politics, and millions of young men flock to him for his opinions. Is he the Joe Rogan of the left ...

item.title: Accordion master Flaco Jimenez has died at 86
item.description: Over a career that spanned 70 years, Jimenez' playing came to define the Tex-Mex music and carried the tradition-drenched conjuto sound all over the w...

item.title: Employers added 73,000 jobs in July, falling short of forecasts
item.description: Hiring across the U.S. was weaker than expected in July, a sign the labor market is shifting into lower gear.

item.title: Hurricane plan for Florida's Alligator Alcatraz heavily redacted, raising concerns
item.description: Florida's redacted hurricane plan for the Alligator Alcatraz migrant center is drawing calls for transparency from lawmakers.

item.title: Zelensky demands tougher sanctions after Russian strikes kill 31 in Kyiv
item.description: It comes after the capital saw one of the most deadliest assaults since Russia's 2022 invasion.

item.title: Watch: 'UFO' spotted in Australian skies identified as Chinese rocket
item.description: Astrophysicists said that the unusual lights spotted over Brisbane were tied to a satellite launch from China.

item.title: Kindergarten vaccination rates fall as exemptions rise
item.description: Vaccination coverage among kindergartners decreased for all reported vaccines during the 2024 to 2025 school year, data posted to the CDC website show...

item.title: Teacher charged in fatal stabbing of couple on a hike with their kids is ordered held without bond

item.title: Trump envoy visits controversial Gaza aid distribution site
item.description: The visit with the IDF follows near daily reports of deadly shootings in the vicinity of the sites.

item.title: This week on "Sunday Morning" (August 3): The Money Issue
item.description: A look at the features for this week's broadcast of the Emmy-winning program, hosted by Jane Pauley.

item.title: Zoo worker killed by tiger in Jerusalem
item.description: A worker has died after being attacked during a "behind-the-scenes tour" for visitors.

item.title: Judge blocks Trump administration from ending protections for 60,000 from Central America and Nepal
